plot outline: In an interior village deep in Karnataka, a fortune teller visits a poverty-stricken family and tells them that their fortune is going to change overnight. A mysterious traveller (played by Jayaram Karthik) visits their home on the same day and asks to stay overnight. What happens during that one intense night forms the rest of the story.
title: Aa Karaala Ratri
plot: A fortune teller tells a poverty-stricken family that their fate will change overnight when a mysterious traveler visits there home to stay overnight.

In an interior village deep in Karnataka, a fortune teller visits a poverty-stricken family and tells them that their fortune is going to change overnight. A mysterious traveller (played by Jayaram Karthik) visits their home on the same day and asks to stay overnight. What happens during that one intense night forms the rest of the story.
